verses.verse: Also, thou son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, prophesy <WH5012> <WH8734> unto the mountains <WH2022> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, and say <WH559> <WH8804>, Ye mountains <WH2022> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, hear <WH8085> <WH8798> the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068>:

Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; Because the enemy <WH341> <WH8802> hath said <WH559> <WH8804> against you, Aha <WH1889>, even the ancient <WH5769> high places <WH1116> are ours in possession <WH4181>:

Therefore prophesy <WH5012> <WH8734> and say <WH559> <WH8804>, Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; Because they have made you desolate <WH8074> <WH8800>, and swallowed you up <WH7602> <WH8800> on every side <WH5439>, that ye might be a possession <WH4181> unto the residue <WH7611> of the heathen <WH1471>, and ye are taken up <WH5927> <WH8735> in the lips <WH8193> of talkers <WH3956>, and are an infamy <WH1681> of the people <WH5971>:

Therefore, ye mountains <WH2022> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, hear <WH8085> <WH8798> the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069> to the mountains <WH2022>, and to the hills <WH1389>, to the rivers <WH650>, and to the valleys <WH1516>, to the desolate <WH8074> <WH8802> wastes <WH2723>, and to the cities <WH5892> that are forsaken <WH5800> <WH8737>, which became a prey <WH957> and derision <WH3933> to the residue <WH7611> of the heathen <WH1471> that are round about <WH5439>;

Therefore thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; Surely in the fire <WH784> of my jealousy <WH7068> have I spoken <WH1696> <WH8765> against the residue <WH7611> of the heathen <WH1471>, and against all Idumea <WH123>, which have appointed <WH5414> <WH8804> my land <WH776> into their possession <WH4181> with the joy <WH8057> of all their heart <WH3824>, with despiteful <WH7589> minds <WH5315>, to cast it out <WH4054> for a prey <WH957>.

Prophesy <WH5012> <WH8734> therefore concerning the land <WH127> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, and say <WH559> <WH8804> unto the mountains <WH2022>, and to the hills <WH1389>, to the rivers <WH650>, and to the valleys <WH1516>, Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; Behold, I have spoken <WH1696> <WH8765> in my jealousy <WH7068> and in my fury <WH2534>, because ye have borne <WH5375> <WH8804> the shame <WH3639> of the heathen <WH1471>:

Therefore thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; I have lifted up <WH5375> <WH8804> mine hand <WH3027>, Surely the heathen <WH1471> that are about <WH5439> you, they shall bear <WH5375> <WH8799> their shame <WH3639>.

But ye, O mountains <WH2022> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, ye shall shoot forth <WH5414> <WH8799> your branches <WH6057>, and yield <WH5375> <WH8799> your fruit <WH6529> to my people <WH5971> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>; for they are at hand <WH7126> <WH8765> to come <WH935> <WH8800>.
For, behold, I am for you, and I will turn <WH6437> <WH8804> unto you, and ye shall be tilled <WH5647> <WH8738> and sown <WH2232> <WH8738>:

And I will multiply <WH7235> <WH8689> men <WH120> upon you, all the house <WH1004> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, even all of it: and the cities <WH5892> shall be inhabited <WH3427> <WH8738>, and the wastes <WH2723> shall be builded <WH1129> <WH8735>:

And I will multiply <WH7235> <WH8689> upon you man <WH120> and beast <WH929>; and they shall increase <WH7235> <WH8804> and bring fruit <WH6509> <WH8804>: and I will settle <WH3427> <WH8689> you after your old estates <WH6927>, and will do better <WH2895> <WH8689> unto you than at your beginnings <WH7221>: and ye shall know <WH3045> <WH8804> that I am the YY <WH3068>.

Yea, I will cause men <WH120> to walk <WH3212> <WH8689> upon you, even my people <WH5971> Yisra'EL <WH3478>; and they shall possess <WH3423> <WH8804> thee, and thou shalt be their inheritance <WH5159>, and thou shalt no more <WH3254> <WH8686> henceforth bereave <WH7921> <WH8763> them of men.

Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; Because they say <WH559> <WH8802> unto you, Thou land devourest up <WH398> <WH8802> men <WH120>, and hast bereaved <WH7921> <WH8764> thy nations <WH1471>;

Therefore thou shalt devour <WH398> <WH8799> men <WH120> no more, neither bereave <WH7921> <WH8762> <WH3782> <WH8762> thy nations <WH1471> any more, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>.

Neither will I cause men to hear <WH8085> <WH8686> in thee the shame <WH3639> of the heathen <WH1471> any more, neither shalt thou bear <WH5375> <WH8799> the reproach <WH2781> of the people <WH5971> any more, neither shalt thou cause thy nations <WH1471> to fall <WH3782> <WH8686> any more, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>.
Moreover the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068> came unto me, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, when the house <WH1004> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> dwelt <WH3427> <WH8802> in their own land <WH127>, they defiled <WH2930> <WH8762> it by their own way <WH1870> and by their doings <WH5949>: their way <WH1870> was before <WH6440> me as the uncleanness <WH2932> of a removed woman <WH5079>.

Wherefore I poured <WH8210> <WH8799> my fury <WH2534> upon them for the blood <WH1818> that they had shed <WH8210> <WH8804> upon the land <WH776>, and for their idols <WH1544> wherewith they had polluted <WH2930> <WH8765> it:

And I scattered <WH6327> <WH8686> them among the heathen <WH1471>, and they were dispersed <WH2219> <WH8735> through the countries <WH776>: according to their way <WH1870> and according to their doings <WH5949> I judged <WH8199> <WH8804> them.

And when they entered <WH935> <WH8799> unto the heathen <WH1471>, whither they went <WH935> <WH8804>, they profaned <WH2490> <WH8762> my holy <WH6944> name <WH8034>, when they said <WH559> <WH8800> to them, These are the people <WH5971> of the YY <WH3068>, and are gone forth <WH3318> <WH8804> out of his land <WH776>.

But I had pity <WH2550> <WH8799> for mine holy <WH6944> name <WH8034>, which the house <WH1004> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> had profaned <WH2490> <WH8765> among the heathen <WH1471>, whither they went <WH935> <WH8804>.

Therefore say <WH559> <WH8798> unto the house <WH1004> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; I do <WH6213> <WH8802> not this for your sakes, O house <WH1004> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, but for mine holy <WH6944> name's <WH8034> sake, which ye have profaned <WH2490> <WH8765> among the heathen <WH1471>, whither ye went <WH935> <WH8804>.

And I will sanctify <WH6942> <WH8765> my great <WH1419> name <WH8034>, which was profaned <WH2490> <WH8794> among the heathen <WH1471>, which ye have profaned <WH2490> <WH8765> in the midst <WH8432> of them; and the heathen <WH1471> shall know <WH3045> <WH8804> that I am the YY <WH3068>, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>, when I shall be sanctified <WH6942> <WH8736> in you before their eyes <WH5869>.

For I will take <WH3947> <WH8804> you from among <WH4480> the heathen <WH1471>, and gather <WH6908> <WH8765> you out of all countries <WH776>, and will bring <WH935> <WH8689> you into your own land <WH127>.

Then will I sprinkle <WH2236> <WH8804> clean <WH2889> water <WH4325> upon you, and ye shall be clean <WH2891> <WH8804>: from all your filthiness <WH2932>, and from all your idols <WH1544>, will I cleanse <WH2891> <WH8762> you.

A new <WH2319> heart <WH3820> also will I give <WH5414> <WH8804> you, and a new <WH2319> spirit <WH7307> will I put <WH5414> <WH8799> within <WH7130> you: and I will take away <WH5493> <WH8689> the stony <WH68> heart <WH3820> out of your flesh <WH1320>, and I will give <WH5414> <WH8804> you an heart <WH3820> of flesh <WH1320>.

And I will put <WH5414> <WH8799> my spirit <WH7307> within <WH7130> you, and cause <WH6213> <WH8804> you to walk <WH3212> <WH8799> in my statutes <WH2706>, and ye shall keep <WH8104> <WH8799> my judgments <WH4941>, and do <WH6213> <WH8804> them.
And ye shall dwell <WH3427> <WH8804> in the land <WH776> that I gave <WH5414> <WH8804> to your fathers <WH1>; and ye shall be my people <WH5971>, and I will be your 'Elohim <WH430>.

I will also save <WH3467> <WH8689> you from all your uncleannesses <WH2932>: and I will call <WH7121> <WH8804> for the corn <WH1715>, and will increase <WH7235> <WH8689> it, and lay <WH5414> <WH8799> no famine <WH7458> upon you.

And I will multiply <WH7235> <WH8689> the fruit <WH6529> of the tree <WH6086>, and the increase <WH8570> of the field <WH7704>, that ye shall receive <WH3947> <WH8799> no more reproach <WH2781> of famine <WH7458> among the heathen <WH1471>.

Then shall ye remember <WH2142> <WH8804> your own evil <WH7451> ways <WH1870>, and your doings <WH4611> that were not good <WH2896>, and shall lothe <WH6962> <WH8738> yourselves in your own sight <WH6440> for your iniquities <WH5771> and for your abominations <WH8441>.

Not for your sakes do <WH6213> <WH8802> I this, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>, be it known <WH3045> <WH8735> unto you: be ashamed <WH954> <WH8798> and confounded <WH3637> <WH8734> for your own ways <WH1870>, O house <WH1004> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>.

Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; In the day <WH3117> that I shall have cleansed <WH2891> <WH8763> you from all your iniquities <WH5771> I will also cause you to dwell <WH3427> <WH8689> in the cities <WH5892>, and the wastes <WH2723> shall be builded <WH1129> <WH8738>.
And the desolate <WH8074> <WH8737> land <WH776> shall be tilled <WH5647> <WH8735>, whereas it lay desolate <WH8077> in the sight <WH5869> of all that passed by <WH5674> <WH8802>.

And they shall say <WH559> <WH8804>, This <WH1977> land <WH776> that was desolate <WH8074> <WH8737> is become like the garden <WH1588> of Eden <WH5731>; and the waste <WH2720> and desolate <WH8074> <WH8737> and ruined <WH2040> <WH8737> cities <WH5892> are become fenced <WH1219> <WH8803>, and are inhabited <WH3427> <WH8804>.

Then the heathen <WH1471> that are left <WH7604> <WH8735> round about <WH5439> you shall know <WH3045> <WH8804> that I the YY <WH3068> build <WH1129> <WH8804> the ruined <WH2040> <WH8737> places, and plant <WH5193> <WH8804> that that was desolate <WH8074> <WH8737>: I the YY <WH3068> have spoken <WH1696> <WH8765> it, and I will do <WH6213> <WH8804> it.

Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; I will yet for this be enquired <WH1875> <WH8735> of by the house <WH1004> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, to do <WH6213> <WH8800> it for them; I will increase <WH7235> <WH8686> them with men <WH120> like a flock <WH6629>.

As the holy <WH6944> flock <WH6629>, as the flock <WH6629> of Yerushalayim <WH3389> in her solemn feasts <WH4150>; so shall the waste <WH2720> cities <WH5892> be filled <WH4392> with flocks <WH6629> of men <WH120>: and they shall know <WH3045> <WH8804> that I am the YY <WH3068>.
